name: Knowledge Manifest
title: Knowledge Manifest
description: Central manifest tracking all knowledge files, their versions, sources, and update status

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Manifest enables verification of knowledge file versions
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: File tracking supports user knowledge management goals
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Sources and metadata make knowledge provenance explicit
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Dependency tracking prevents incompatible knowledge updates
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified manifest structure across all knowledge files

review-checklist.json.title: Review Checklist
review-checklist.json.description: Code and design review checklist patterns

general.description: Central manifest tracking all knowledge files, their versions, sources, and update status
general.code_example:
# Apply pattern as documented in this knowledge file
# See related sections for implementation details
best_practices: Document the pattern usage and rationale in code comments
Validate implementation against domain requirements before deployment
Update manifest metadata (version, updated timestamp) whenever knowledge files change
Track dependencies between knowledge files - update dependent files when dependencies change
Use semantic versioning (major.minor.patch) for knowledge file versions
Document sources (GitHub repos, documentation sites) with trust_level for traceability
Set appropriate evolution.channel (stable/latest/evolving) based on update frequency
Lock critical knowledge files (locked: true) to prevent accidental modifications
Record change_history for files with significant updates - helps track evolution
Use subscriptions to group related knowledge files for batch updates
Verify checksums when available to ensure knowledge file integrity
Review staleness_threshold_days and update stale knowledge files proactively
